message: I use it on all major deployments (Voxy.com is the latest). Works very well. It's installed locally on each web server between DB and the web server.
I'm told the new hotness is pgpool now.
@coderanger as you can see in the first post, pgBouncer clearly outperforms pgpool.
pgpool is slower but it actually parses the SQL so you can do stuff like master/slave load balancing. If you just want a connection pool, the pgBouncer is definitely faster though
